group_1.textRight: Ah...@Another of Karin's victims... is here toooo...

group_1.textLeft: Just what do you know about this?

group_1.textRight: Mm... It's not like I know...
It's probably something kinda like thisss...@Is what I'm thinkinggg...

group_1.textLeft: Speak up. I want you to speak clearly.

group_1.textRight: Mmm...
Alina, remember meeee...?

group_1.textLeft: No.

group_1.textRight: Figurrres...@We weren't that clooose...
We're just Magical Girls from the same schoool...

group_1.textLeft: ... What are you trying to say?

group_1.textRight: Mm... I really, really love to laze arouuund...
I'd loooove to sleep aaall day if I could...

group_1.textLeft: If it's a waste of time, Alina's not listening.

group_1.textRight: C'mon... There's an order to the story...
... Where was I again...?

group_1.textLeft: You were talking about you being a slacker.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, that's right...
The reason a slacker like me...
is working so hard like this is because...
it's all Karin's "orders", you see?

group_1.textLeft: Orders?

group_1.textRight: Yeah... Just a while agooo...
Found you!@Asleep, as expected.

group_1.textLeft: ...Hm? Akari and Karin...?@What's wrooong...?

group_1.textRight: Figured you'd be skipping school anyway,@so I came looking.
I thought I'd warn Karin from the executive@committee
to watch out for Hotaru so she doesn't slack off...!
So that's what this is about...!

group_1.textLeft: Ehhh... @I want to sleep just a little longer...
[chara:304801:effect_shake:eyeClose_1]... Owwww...!@[chara:304801:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:304801:eyeClose_0][chara:304801:lipSynch_1]Candy...?

group_1.textRight: It's fine, just get to work!
... Ever since that time...
Every time I ever tried to take a liiiittle break,@the candies started raining...
It's such a nuisance...

group_1.textLeft: And then...

group_1.textRight: You get what I'm saying, right...?

group_1.textLeft: ... Way more than Alina wants to.

group_1.textRight: It was so tough...
I tried to ignore them at first, too...
But a biiiiig candy crushed me flat so I couldn't@sleep...
I've given up trying...
I'm in trouble here...

group_1.textLeft: You don't sound like you're in trouble.

group_1.textRight: I really am, though...
We can't go against Karin's orders at all...

group_1.textLeft: What?

group_1.textRight: Mm... Well, to compare...
She's like the king in a King's Game or something...?

group_1.textLeft: So the fool girl's magic is causing this?

group_1.textRight: Mm... I'm pretty sure she normally doesn't have@an ability like that, though...
She looks a little different, so maybe that's why...?

group_1.textLeft: Thinking back at it, the Coordinator and the@Pumpking...
She was talking about something of the sort,@wasn't she?

group_1.textRight: Mm... So...
Maybe it's because she's the king of Halloween...?
Maybe because of that... I can't disobey her at all...

group_1.textLeft: That means...

group_1.narration: [flashEffect:flashWhite1][se:3201_heal]"[textRed:You have to be useful]@[textRed:and help out everyone!]"
[flashEffect:flashWhite1][se:3201_heal]"[textRed:Make sure you get rid of them!]"

group_1.textLeft: ... Those orders are the source of all the trouble,@then?

group_1.textRight: You do have some idea about what you're@ordered to do, hmm...

group_1.textLeft: Unbelievable.
Why does Alina have to be put through all this?!

group_1.textRight: Who knows...?@I'm certainly not one of them...

group_1.textLeft: If you get what's going on to that extent,@don't you think you should be doing something?

group_1.textRight: Mm...
It's clear there's magic at work, but...@We don't really know much more...
I said something about the king of Halloween,@right...?

group_1.textLeft: What about it?

group_1.textRight: If so...
Then maybe it's only effective during Halloween...?
The range of that power doesn't seem to be@too wide...
Then... Rather than disobeying orders and@getting into trouble...
Helping with the preparations...@Might be a better idea...

group_1.textLeft: Absolutely not!
Aaaaaah!! Alina's frustrated!!

group_1.textRight: Hmm... Try drinking milk to calm down...

group_1.textLeft: Your attitude towards this doesn't help!!
